name: Pro Gardener - Monster Edition (LD #33)
description:
Ever wondered what monsters like to do with their time off from scaring/eating people? Why, a spot of gardening, of course!

In Pro Gardener: Monster Edition, you are the monster... gardener! Your aim is to help your plants grow by giving them what they need, be it swamp water, 'Quik Gro' plant food, various human innards, or some suspiciously blood-like liquid... Simply select your tool from the panel and then click on your plants to keep them happy... and alive!
